attributes.action: Raise the main bridges in glengormley so it can stop taking lives!
attributes.additional_details: The two main bridges are the ones beside the Bellevue arms and the hightown. This year alone we have saw and heard about so many deaths that have happened and so many that have tried but have been prevented. Let's start a petition to get these raised!
attributes.background: Every couple of weeks we are hearing about another life being taken to soon, by people trying to comment suicide by jumping of particular bridges in glengormley. The bridges are far to low and hopefully by starting a petition we can get this raised to cause less deaths or near death!

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:
http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
